Package com.github.anastaciocintra.escpos

Class PrintModeStyle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.anastaciocintra.escpos.PrintModeStyle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EscPosConst
    public class PrintModeStyle
extends Object
implements EscPosConst
    Supply ESC/POS text style with the set of Print Mode commands NOTE: You can use this class when your printer isn't compatible with Style class, otherwise, always prefer to use Style class, this is because PrintModeStyle have less features than Style class. Go to samples/textprintmodestyle to see how to use it.
    See Also:
    Style

      • getConfigBytes

        public byte[] getConfigBytes()
                      throws IOException
        Configure font Style.

        Selects the character font and styles (emphasize, double-height, double-width, and underline) together..

        ASCII ESC ! n

        Select justification

        Returns:
        ESC/POS commands to configure style
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
